title: Energy Secretary Rick Perry: Greta Thunberg Should Be Back In School Rather Than Being Used As A Tool
text:
Secretary of Energy Rick Perry spoke with Brian Kilmeade about the happenings at the UN. He said adults who put fear in young people over climate change for political purposes should be ashamed and 16 year old climate activist Greta Thunberg should be back in school rather than being used as a tool by the left. Perry also spoke about America being the number one oil and gas producing nation in the world, why democrats should rethink their impeachment push and the idea that a President cannot have a private conversation with another world leader.

Secretary Perry on 16 year old climate activist Greta Thunberg

(Perry) Brian I do agree that she said something very ,very true. She should be back across the ocean in school rather than being used as a tool.

(Kilmeade) You think she is being used?

(Perry) Absolutely,that is a shameful use of this young lady to scent to scare her the way that she's being scared and scaring people around the world by saying The world is going to end in 12 years. One of the great fallacies that has ever come out of the left's mouth and using young people like this they should truly be ashamed of themselves for that because the fact of the matter is this country is making the most positive impact of any country in the world. You know if she believes this she needs to go to China and talk to the Chinese.
